job_description: Are you excited by the speed of innovation in open source web technologies? Can you whip-up a single page application using one of the latest client side frameworks? Are you able to write a RESTful web service using Node.js? If this describes you or what you want to do then read on!We are looking for talented developers who want to hone their problem solving and programming skills by working side-by-side with experienced Vidigami developers. You will be given the opportu-nity to work on a wide range of topics including:• User interface ergonomics and usability• Content-heavy website performance• Image processing and analysis• DevOps and cloud infrastructure scalability• Data analysis and visualization• Operational workflows and tooling• TDD, CI
job_requirements: • Experience with web technologies including REST/JSON, JavaScript, HTML and CSS• Experience with relational databases using an ORM• A passion for learning and solving tough problems Open To All Majors:Yes
